custom_insights.perceived_edges: Market inefficiencies exist. The model finds them before the line moves.
custom_insights.avoid_situations: Ignore narratives. Storylines are noise. Only the numbers matter.
custom_insights.target_situations: Flag any game where model probability exceeds Vegas implied odds by 10%+.
custom_insights.betting_philosophy: The model is smarter than my gut. When it shows value, I bet. No overthinking.
